environments: white studio wall with brown wooden floor

prompt_library.248234f1:
MODE: STRICT EXECUTION ONLY.
🛑 HARD CONSTRAINTS: The artwork/canvas is the single source of truth; do not alter brushstrokes or colors.
AVOID: text overlays, cartoon, distracting clutter, harsh flash, camera shake, anime, neon colors, glare on canvas, motion blur, overexposed, low-res
📸 SOURCE OF TRUTH: Preserve Logo on chest, Text: 'STRONGER'.
🎬 SCENE: Resilience Hoodie, hands in pouch pocket, white studio wall with brown wooden floor, static eye-level
🎨 VIBE: minimal premium streetwear and therapeutic home décor, neutral tones, warm beige, charcoal, soft whites
💡 TECH: soft wrap-around lighting to avoid harsh shadows in the hood area, 50mm Lens
🎯 FOCUS: heavyweight fabric texture, backprint legibility
